titles.title: Mortgage Insurance Tax Deduction Act of 2019
Mortgage Insurance Tax Deduction Act of 2019
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent the deduction for mortgage insurance premiums.
Mortgage Insurance Tax Deduction Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Mortgage Insurance Tax Deduction Act of 2019
This bill permanently extends the tax deduction for mortgage insurance premiums. (The deduction expired at the end of 2017.)
